description.narrative: Le projet vise à intégrer la gestion des aires protégées dans le processus de décentralisation, sous gestion communautaire.

activity-description.narrative: Région de la Boucle du Mouhoun

sector.narrative: Eradicate poverty in all its forms and dimensions

description.narrative: Governance framework for the incorporation of conservation into Burkina Fasos decentralization process established
Financial and technical cooperation agreements to strengthen and promote local capacities in biodiversity management facilitated by the project

comment.narrative: None or very limited resources are available to municipalities and local groups to strengthen biodiversity management capacities

All 3 municipalities Boromo Tcheriba and Gassan and at least 10 local groups participating in the project will have improved financial technical and human resources capacities as a result of the project
No significant progress because of the national political context and the change of all the responsible peoples in the municipalities and also due to the level of progress of the project activities

All 3 municipalities Boromo Tcheriba and Gassan and at least 10 local groups participating in the project will have improved financial technical and human resources capacities as a result of the project
No significant progress because of the national political context and the change of all the responsible peoples in the municipalities and also due to the level of progress of the project activities

description.narrative:
Increased scores on the UNDPs Capacity Development Scorecard for Protected Areas Management over the baseline
Refer to Annex 5 for summarized and detailed scores

comment.narrative:
Systemic 9 30 30
Institutional 18 45 40
Individual 10 21 48
Overall 3796
General avg 39
Scores expressed in absolute terms increase by at least 20

No significant progress because of the change of project manager and the lack of responsible person for monitoring and evaluation we think that the flora and fauna previous inventories will contributes to reach the objective
Scores expressed in absolute terms increase by at least 20

No significant progress because of the change of project manager and the lack of responsible person for monitoring and evaluation we think that the flora and fauna previous inventories will contributes to reach the objective

description.narrative: The existence of adequate normative texts related to regulating and implementing participatory arrangements for forest resources and protected area management adequacy to be independently assessed through project evaluations

comment.narrative: The Decentralization Law of 2004 contains provisions for devolution of natural resource management to municipalities there are however no official provisions to operationalize devolution in practice

A model for land stewardship agreement for gazetted forests andor areas in their buffer zones involving communities has been developed and approved by DGFF and it is under initial implementation in the Boucles du Mouhoun Region on a pilot basis
No significant progress but the results of the ongoing study on Elaboration de textes règlementaires locaux sur la cogestion des ressources naturelles will contribute to reach this objective

A model for land stewardship agreement for gazetted forests andor areas in their buffer zones involving communities has been developed and approved by DGFF and it is under initial implementation in the Boucles du Mouhoun Region on a pilot basis
No significant progress but the results of the ongoing study on Elaboration de textes règlementaires locaux sur la cogestion des ressources naturelles will contribute to reach this objective

description.narrative: The effective management of community PAs is demonstrated in pilot sites in the Boucles du Mouhoun PA Corridor

Increased scores on the GEF4s PA Management Effectiveness Tracking Tool METT for all five pilot PAs 1 National Park or NP and 4 Gazetted Forests or FC in the Boucles du Mouhoun
Refer to Annex 6 for the complete SO1 Tracking Tool

comment.narrative:
1 Deux Balés NP 51
2 Tisse FC 30
3 Oualou FC 30
4 Sí FC 30
5 Sourou FC 30

All scores gt 40 by the MTE
All scores are gt50 by end of project

No significant progress because of the change of project manager and the lack of responsible person for monitoring and evaluation we think that the flora and fauna previous inventories will contributes to reach the objective

All scores are gt50 by end of project

description.narrative: PA management and business plans prepared for pilot sites in the Boucles du Mouhoun

comment.narrative:
None of the target sites for the project count on a management plan
None of the sites count on a PA business plans
All PA pilot sites count on uptodate management and business plans under initial implementation

No significant progress because of the change of project manager and the lack of responsible person for monitoring and evaluation we think that the flora and fauna previous inventories and the studies on Conception de systèmes et outils de planification ainsi que le suiviévaluation prévoyant des objectifs de gestion des aires protégées compatibles avec le développement local durable and Elaboration des textes règlementaires locaux sur la cogestion des ressources naturelles will contributes to reach the objective

description.narrative: Communities perception of their livelihood stake in the good stewardship of biological resources in pilot sites in the Boucles du Mouhoun PA Corridor measured through the periodic and independent application of the Most Significant Change MSC technique

comment.narrative:
Not Applicable
The MSC technique is to be applied once the project has been launched and some form of change has occurred The baseline corresponds to all assessments that corroborate the situation analysis for this project particularly with respect to landuses and livelihoods
Positive changes in livelihoods are perceived through the independent application of the MSC technique

No significant progress because of the change of project manager and the lack of responsible person for monitoring and evaluation despite the situation the ongoing studies on Conservation ou réintroduction despèces végétales disparues rares ou menacées des zones tampins de la région de la Boucle du Mouhoun and Cartographie thématiques de la zones dintervention du projet will contributes to reach the objective

description.narrative: To incorporate protected areas as a key tool for biodiversity conservation into Burkina Fasos decentralization process through the operationalization of community managed protected areas including gazetted forests and their buffer zones

PAs and buffer zones number of and hectarage in the municipalities of Boromo Tcheriba and Gassan in the Boucles du Mouhoun Region that are effectively comanaged by communities as conservation sustainable use zones implying a change in the PA management model

comment.narrative: 0 protected areas and gazetted forests in the Mouhoun region allow effective community participation in conservation management

At least 1 national park and 4 gazetted forests and their buffer zones covering approximately 160000 hectares are being comanaged by communities eg through PA stewardship models recognized by the State

No significant progress because of the change of the project manager and the lack of responsible person for the monitoring and evaluation despite this situation studies on Elaboration de textes réglementaires locaux sur la cogestion des ressources naturelles Conception des systèmes et outils de planification ainsi que de suiviévaluation prévoyant des objectifs de gestion des aires protégées compatibles avec le développement local durable are on going and are expected be finalized in 2015

No significant progress because of the change of the project manager and the lack of responsible person for the monitoring and evaluation despite this situation studies on Elaboration de textes réglementaires locaux sur la cogestion des ressources naturelles Conception des systèmes et outils de planification ainsi que de suiviévaluation prévoyant des objectifs de gestion des aires protégées compatibles avec le développement local durable are on going and are expected be finalized in 2015

description.narrative: Status of the elephant population in the Mouhoun region ecological corridor

comment.narrative: Around 30 elephants Deux Balés NP and migrant herds along the Mouhoun corridor estimated roughly as 300600 individuals
50 elephants in Deux Balés and the maintenance of numbers for migrant herds along the Mouhoun corridor
No significant progress but the study on cartograhie thématique de la zone dintervention du projet is achieved and the TOR are prepared by the project for flora and fauna inventories in the region
50 elephants in Deux Balés and the maintenance of numbers for migrant herds along the Mouhoun corridor
No significant progress but the study on cartograhie thématique de la zone dintervention du projet is achieved and the TOR are prepared by the project for flora and fauna inventories in the region

description.narrative: Number of forest management and conservation committees established at the municipalvillage level in the Boucles du Mouhoun PA Corridor eg comités villageoises des foríªtsCVF but also other types of community based groups that may be established with the help of the project

comment.narrative: Communitybased forest management committees are rare ineffective and operate only in the buffer zones and outside the PAs
More than 20 communitybased forest management committees are established and functioning in the buffer zones and within protected areas

No significant progress because of the change of the project manager and the lack of responsible person for monitoring and evaluation despite this situation two communitybased forest management committees are create in the same area by PIF project and concertations between the two projects are ongoing for the use the same communities
